item.title: About
item.description:
I work in an ISO 17025 accredited photometry laboratory in Switzerland, specialising in light measurement — luminous flux, spectral power distribution, flicker analysis (PST/SVM) and measurement uncertainty.

This blog is a collection of technical notes on photometry, metrology and the tools I develop to support laboratory work.

Open-source

  • pyldt — Python library for reading and writing EULUMDAT (.ldt) photometric files, available on PyPI as eulumdat-py

Laboratory

  • Goniophotometer Rigo 801 - TechnoTeam
  • Accredited according to ISO 17025

item.title: The EULUMDAT file format — a complete technical reference
item.description: A field-by-field description of the EULUMDAT .ldt photometric file format, including symmetry types, lamp sets, intensity data and real-world variations.
